text: Jealous James is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Jerold T. Hevener - Jim Jenkins * Marguerite Ne Moyer - Clara Jenkins * Eva Bell - Maude Mullen * Bert Tracy - Sam (as Herbert Tracy) * Raymond McKee - Harry * Oliver Hardy - Grocery Boy (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Jealous James
